unavailable-labels.adobe-flash: Adobe Flash Player is no longer available as it has been discontinued as of January 2020.
unavailable-labels.microsoft-office: The full Microsoft Office suite can be installed with CrossOver, but CrossOver Linux is not in the Feren OS Store.
unavailable-labels.peppermint-ice: If there's a website that's missing from Websites, please submit a request via Send Feedback.
